elements.label: Yemu, an acquaintance
elements.description: A clingy sort with an eye for fashion. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Yemu, a believer
elements.description: Yemu was young when his brother left for the Great War. He hasn't yet returned, but Yemu is optimistic.

elements.label: Yemu, a disciple
elements.description: He spends many an evening outfitting the great and the rich. Rumour has it his inspiration is a mysterious warlock from overseas, but Yemu laughs rumours off with that silky laugh of his.

elements.label: Yemu, a Tarantellist
elements.description: His fashion has taken a turn for the obsessive and artful. Coats that hold two ladies at once, and trousers with pearls stitched in. He has sparked four new crazes this week alone.

elements.label: Yemu, a Troublemaker
elements.description: A troublesome sort with an eye for societal faux-pas.

elements.label: Yemu, a Rival
elements.description: Parties become hard to attend when you don't keep up with his fashions.

elements.label: Yemu, a Long in the Making
elements.description: He has found his missing brother. He tells us the Thunderskin won't protect us anymore.

elements.label: Yemu, a Prisoner
elements.description: He begs for a companion in his cell. We have grown wise against it after he made his last 'overcoat'.
